sentences.en: Try humus on wheat pita bread.
sentences.cn: 尝试放一些腐殖酸在小麦皮塔面包上。

sentences.en: In the food court, they eat pita wraps and Japanese noodles.
sentences.cn: 在美食庭院里，他们吃着皮塔饼卷和日本面条。

sentences.en: Hummus with cucumber and tomato slices on whole wheat pita.
sentences.cn: 鹰嘴豆沙加黄瓜，全麦皮塔饼配上西红柿切片。
